summary: Fixes oily vanilla hair! aka. the hair specular light.
descriptionHtml:
Could't find a fix for this, so i made it myself. Hated the oily looking specular light on all the vanilla hair models. Included are also all horns and other "on-top-of-head" stuff.

See before/after picture.

This fixes the problem.

WILL WORK WITH ALL MODS, EXCEPT MODS THAT REPLACE VANILLA HAIR MESHES!
WORKS WITG ALL TEXTURE MODS!

I recommend "Fine Hair HQ" by Yuril: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7627


No future version as this was sooooo many files du go through, and took forever.

===========================================
